comment: good but not GREAT,  expected better given the green label

​
The third Feis Ile sample of the evening has a beautiful caramel nose, like a Talenti ice cream. It's easy to drink neat, but a few drops of water brings out the peat. The finish is a long swirl of peat and honey. I'd mark this 4.5/5, making it my joint second favorite of the eight.
Very similar to usual Distillers Edition. Therefore a good dram if a little overpriced.
